title: Block Sensor
description: Fires off a specified event when a block in the block list is broken within the sensor range.

sensor_radius.title: Sensor Radius
sensor_radius.description: The maximum radial distance in which a specified block can be detected. The biggest radius is 32.0.

on_break.title: On Break
on_break.description: Blocks that will trigger the component when broken and what event will trigger.

items.title: On Block Broken
items.description: Event to run when a block breaks.

block_list.title: Block List
block_list.description: List of blocks that will trigger the sensor.

on_block_broken.title: On Block Broken
on_block_broken.description: Event to run when a block breaks.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: List of sources that break the block to listen for. If none are specified, all block breaks will be detected.
